description: Returns details for a Provisioned Throughput. For more information, see Provisioned Throughput in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: provisionedModelId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or name of the Provisioned Throughput.

nested_items.name: modelUnits
nested_items.description: The number of model units allocated to this Provisioned Throughput.

nested_items.name: desiredModelUnits
nested_items.description: The number of model units that was requested for this Provisioned Throughput.

nested_items.name: provisionedModelName
nested_items.description: The name of the Provisioned Throughput.

nested_items.name: provisionedModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Provisioned Throughput.

nested_items.name: modelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model associated with this Provisioned Throughput.

nested_items.name: desiredModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model requested to be associated to this Provisioned Throughput. This value differs from the modelArn if updating hasn't completed.

nested_items.name: foundationModelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the base model for which the Provisioned Throughput was created, or of the base model that the custom model for which the Provisioned Throughput was created was customized.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the Provisioned Throughput.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the creation time for this Provisioned Throughput.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of the last time that this Provisioned Throughput was modified.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: A failure message for any issues that occurred during creation, updating, or deletion of the Provisioned Throughput.

nested_items.name: commitmentDuration
nested_items.description: Commitment duration of the Provisioned Throughput.

nested_items.name: commitmentExpirationTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the commitment term for the Provisioned Throughput expires.
